Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Votes.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Title: Establishes a task force for the review of the state administrative procedure act
Summary: Establishes a task force for the review of the state administrative procedure act to ensure that administrative rulemaking, adjudication and licensing is consistent, uniform, and not unnecessarily burdensome for regulated entities.
LawCode: Add Art 6 §§601 & 602, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to establishing a task force for the review of the state administrative procedure act
